price: Y preguntan [a los creyentes]: "¿Cuándo llegará el Día del Juicio, si es que dicen la verdad?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
